Message.Text: You’ve got to be kidding me, Tommy! We’re sharing a room again? I thought we agreed on separate rooms this time!
Hey, don’t look at me! I thought you were fine with it. Why didn’t you say anything earlier?
Because I didn’t think we’d have this problem again! I wanted some space this year. This is ridiculous!
Well, it’s too late now! We’re stuck with it. What do you want me to do about it?
I don’t know, but this just ruins the whole trip for me. Even the beer doesn’t sound fun anymore.
Oh, come on! Don’t tell me you’re going to sulk the entire time just because we’re sharing a room. Grow up, Frank!
This isn’t about "sulking." I wanted a break, some space, and now it’s just a mess. I’m not looking forward to this at all anymore.
Fine! Let’s just get through the conference, have a couple of beers, and try to survive sharing the room, okay?
